Alameda.Samuel Merritt University: Samuel Merritt University (SMU) is a private, non-profit, fully accredited health sciences institution located on the Summit campus of the Alta Bates Summit Medical Center in Oakland, California, United States. The University offers undergraduate degrees in nursing and graduate degrees in nursing, physical therapy, physician assistant, occupational therapy, and podiatric medicine. SMU is an affiliate of the Sutter Health Network and Alta Bates Summit Medical Center.
